verses.verse: לְדָוִ֨ד ׀ <WH1732> [A Psalm] of David בָּרֲכִ֣י <WH1288> Bless נַ֭פְשִׁי <WH5315> O my soul אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all קְ֝רָבַ֗י <WH7130> and all that is within אֶת־ <WH853> שֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> name קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH6944> me [bless] his holy

בָּרֲכִ֣י <WH1288> Bless נַ֭פְשִׁי <WH5315> O my soul אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וְאַל־ <WH408> nay תִּ֝שְׁכְּחִ֗י <WH7911> and forget כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner גְּמוּלָֽיו׃ <WH1576> not all his benefits
הַסֹּלֵ֥חַ <WH5545> Who forgiveth לְכָל־ <WH3605> all עֲוֹנֵ֑כִי <WH5771> all thine iniquities הָ֝רֹפֵ֗א <WH7495> who healeth לְכָל־ <WH3605> all תַּחֲלֻאָֽיְכִי׃ <WH8463> all thy diseases

הַגּוֹאֵ֣ל <WH1350> Who redeemeth מִשַּׁ֣חַת <WH7845> from destruction חַיָּ֑יְכִי <WH2416> thy life הַֽ֝מְעַטְּרֵ֗כִי <WH5849> who crowneth חֶ֣סֶד <WH2617> thee with lovingkindness וְרַחֲמִֽים׃ <WH7356> and tender mercies

הַמַּשְׂבִּ֣יַע <WH7646> Who satisfieth בַּטּ֣וֹב <WH2896> with good עֶדְיֵ֑ךְ <WH5716> thy mouth תִּתְחַדֵּ֖שׁ <WH2318> is renewed כַּנֶּ֣שֶׁר <WH5404> like the eagle's נְעוּרָֽיְכִי׃ <WH5271> [things so that] thy youth
עֹשֵׂ֣ה <WH6213> executeth צְדָק֣וֹת <WH6666> righteousness יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> The LORD וּ֝מִשְׁפָּטִ֗ים <WH4941> and judgment לְכָל־ <WH3605> for all עֲשׁוּקִֽים׃ <WH6231> for all that are oppressed
יוֹדִ֣יעַ <WH3045> He made known דְּרָכָ֣יו <WH1870> his ways לְמֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> unto Moses לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> unto the children יִ֝שְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel עֲלִילֽוֹתָיו׃ <WH5949> his acts
רַח֣וּם <WH7349> [is] merciful וְחַנּ֣וּן <WH2587> and gracious יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> The LORD אֶ֖רֶךְ <WH750> slow אַפַּ֣יִם <WH639> to anger וְרַב־ <WH7227> and plenteous חָֽסֶד׃ <WH2617> in mercy
לֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor לָנֶ֥צַח <WH5331> He will not always יָרִ֑יב <WH7378> chide וְלֹ֖א <WH3808> Nor לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> [his anger] for ever יִטּֽוֹר׃ <WH5201> neither will he keep

לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor כַ֭חֲטָאֵינוּ <WH2399> with us after our sins עָ֣שָׂה <WH6213> He hath not dealt לָ֑נוּ וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> Nor כַ֝עֲוֹנֹתֵ֗ינוּ <WH5771> us according to our iniquities גָּמַ֥ל <WH1580> nor rewarded עָלֵֽינוּ׃ <WH5921> and

כִּ֤י <WH3588> as כִגְבֹ֣הַּ <WH1361> is high above שָׁ֭מַיִם <WH8064> For as the heaven עַל־ <WH5921> are above הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> the earth גָּבַ֥ר <WH1396> [so] great חַ֝סְדּ֗וֹ <WH2617> is his mercy עַל־ <WH5921> toward יְרֵאָֽיו׃ <WH3373> toward them that fear

כִּרְחֹ֣ק <WH7368> As far as מִ֭זְרָח <WH4217> the east מִֽמַּֽעֲרָ֑ב <WH4628> is from the west הִֽרְחִ֥יק <WH7368> [so] far hath he removed מִ֝מֶּ֗נּוּ <WH4480> at אֶת־ <WH853> פְּשָׁעֵֽינוּ׃ <WH6588> our transgressions

כְּרַחֵ֣ם <WH7355> pitieth אָ֭ב <WH1> Like as a father עַל־ <WH5921> on בָּנִ֑ים <WH1121> [his] children רִחַ֥ם <WH7355> pitieth יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> [so] the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> that יְרֵאָֽיו׃ <WH3373> them that fear

כִּי־ <WH3588> for ה֖וּא <WH1931> Himself יָדַ֣ע <WH3045> For he knoweth יִצְרֵ֑נוּ <WH3336> our frame זָ֝כ֗וּר <WH2142> he remembereth כִּי־ <WH3588> for עָפָ֥ר <WH6083> that we [are] dust אֲנָֽחְנוּ׃ <WH587> ourselves

אֱ֭נוֹשׁ <WH376> are like כֶּחָצִ֣יר <WH2682> [are] as grass יָמָ֑יו <WH3117> his days כְּצִ֥יץ <WH6731> as a flower הַ֝שָּׂדֶ֗ה <WH7704> of the field כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> so יָצִֽיץ׃ <WH6692> so he flourisheth

כִּ֤י <WH3588> When ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> For the wind עָֽבְרָה־ <WH5674> passeth over בּ֣וֹ וְאֵינֶ֑נּוּ <WH369> is no וְלֹא־ <WH3808> no יַכִּירֶ֖נּוּ <WH5234> thereof shall know ע֣וֹד <WH5750> longer מְקוֹמֽוֹ׃ <WH4725> it and it is gone and the place

וְחֶ֤סֶד <WH2617> But the mercy יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <WH3068> of the LORD מֵעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> [is] from everlasting וְעַד־ <WH5704> to ע֭וֹלָם <WH5769> everlasting עַל־ <WH5921> upon יְרֵאָ֑יו <WH3373> upon them that fear וְ֝צִדְקָת֗וֹ <WH6666> him and his righteousness לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> unto children's בָנִֽים׃ <WH1121> children
לְשֹׁמְרֵ֥י <WH8104> To such as keep בְרִית֑וֹ <WH1285> his covenant וּלְזֹכְרֵ֥י <WH2142> and to those that remember פִ֝קֻּדָ֗יו <WH6490> his commandments לַעֲשׂוֹתָֽם׃ <WH6213> to do

יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> The LORD בַּ֭שָּׁמַיִם <WH8064> in the heavens הֵכִ֣ין <WH3559> hath prepared כִּסְא֑וֹ <WH3678> his throne וּ֝מַלְכוּת֗וֹ <WH4438> and his kingdom בַּכֹּ֥ל <WH3605> all מָשָֽׁלָה׃ <WH4910> ruleth

בָּרֲכ֥וּ <WH1288> Bless יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD מַלְאָ֫כָ֥יו <WH4397> ye his angels גִּבֹּ֣רֵי <WH1368> that excel כֹ֭חַ <WH3581> in strength עֹשֵׂ֣י <WH6213> that do דְבָר֑וֹ <WH1697> his commandments לִ֝שְׁמֹ֗עַ <WH8085> hearkening בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> unto the voice דְּבָרֽוֹ׃ <WH1697> of his word

בָּרֲכ֣וּ <WH1288> Bless יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> ye the LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> all צְבָאָ֑יו <WH6635> all [ye] his hosts מְ֝שָׁרְתָ֗יו <WH8334> [ye] ministers עֹשֵׂ֥י <WH6213> of his that do רְצוֹנֽוֹ׃ <WH7522> his pleasure

בָּרֲכ֤וּ <WH1288> Bless יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <WH3068> the LORD כָּֽל־ <WH3605> all מַעֲשָׂ֗יו <WH4639> all his works בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all מְקֹמ֥וֹת <WH4725> in all places מֶמְשַׁלְתּ֑וֹ <WH4475> of his dominion בָּרֲכִ֥י <WH1288> bless נַ֝פְשִׁ֗י <WH5315> O my soul אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD
